author: scottbw
msg: Added a space to separate some attributes in Widget XML representations  - this was causing some XML parsing issues

author: scottbw
msg: Implemented support in the parser for content using i18n features, including the dir attribute on elements, and the <span> element in element content, according to the new i18n algorithms published in http://dev.w3.org/2006/waf/widgets/ and added unit tests for new methods.
Also altered the AuthorEntity to be localized; this does not affect the Wookie server itself which does not yet support lang/dir attributes on AuthorInfo.
